Skeletons may be encountered during Temple Trekking, in the Graveyard event. They can be killed normally, or destroyed by unleashing the tomb in the centre of the area. The tomb can only be unleashed twice.

They will only drop bones and grant experience if the player dealt any damage to it. Skeletons destroyed solely by the tomb will not do either.

    • 1.2 Main drop
  • 2 Update history
